subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Just wondering,
author: laurie@steuber.com
full_text:
------=_20090515235737000000_47700
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


 
I like graveyards..thats the geneaologist in me. I could spend all day i=
n one taking photos and trying to figure out the family relationships and t=
he relationships of the names to local history...I haven't done much invest=
igating in them, but I was once called to investigate some activity at a ce=
metery - I was called by the caretaker.
 
I have run boxes and held evp ses=
sions in cmeteries, parks, my backyard, places that are reputedly haunted, =
places that are not supposed to be haunted and it seems to not matter - I h=
ave gotten evps and rtsc at all of the types of places - it doesnt seem to =
matter whether the  place is haunted or not. I will say that the best and c=
learest communications I have in my collection are from haunted locations -=
  Fort Mifflin and a haunted apartment building. 
 
Now, if a place is "hau=
nted" by a specific personality, the spirit is already there in the place (=
theoretically), so  when you begin your session (evp or itc) your chances o=
f talking to that particular spirit should be better, but this isn't always=
 the case - the only thing I can say after the year of ITC sessions I have =
done is that it does seem to me like there is some component missing from t=
he equation that might give us, the operator, better control and I am not s=
ure what it is, but I have had several dreams about itc lately and they wer=
e directing me to introduce colors and tones. 
 

-----Original Message----=
-
From: "Diane Mehrez" <deemehrez@...>
Sent: Friday, May 15, 2009 10:=
07pm
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Just wondering,=






Lol Frank, so it's just moldy?

Sent: Thursday, May 14, 2009 6:02=

k!
 
 F-S

Well I guess I am r=
eally directing this to Frank since he recently said that people that go to=
 grave yards have some "hollywoodistic" type of "lost" mind set :) And I di=
d kind of "hint" that the Boxes are BS (they don't work for me) but my word=
s were more a of a PLAY on anothers "emotion" (his) so he would feel single=
d out....as he did when he put a LABEL on the people that "do" go to grave =
yards. And to call me "another seriouse researcher" is just plain argumenti=
ve, as it seems to look like that is his only way to express himself..... A=
s for going to a "moldy dark besement next" I do recall that is where HE sa=
id he does his research :) Sheeesh..... .--- In [mailto:EVP-ITC%40yahoogrou=
ps.com] EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@ ...> wro=

> F-S
